response.original_title: The Limit: An Immersive Cinema Experience
response.overview: Enter a new world of storytelling in this blockbuster “immersive cinema” experience from visionary filmmaker Robert Rodriguez (Sin City). As a rogue agent with a mysterious past, you enlist the help of enhanced super-assassin M-13 (Michelle Rodriguez) to retrieve your identity and strike against the deadly organization that created you. Also featuring Norman Reedus (The Walking Dead), THE LIMIT will put you inside a 20-minute action movie like you’ve never seen!
response.title: The Limit: An Immersive Cinema Experience
